body_html: @SsnL TestTorch is indeed being run twice in test:cuda and twice in test:sparse, although I am not sure how to address https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_cuda.py#L1882-L1884. Also it's probably easier to check Sandcastle for correct behavior after we enable the commit-level sync, and we can put the change in a later diff.
body_text: @SsnL TestTorch is indeed being run twice in test:cuda and twice in test:sparse, although I am not sure how to address https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_cuda.py#L1882-L1884. Also it's probably easier to check Sandcastle for correct behavior after we enable the commit-level sync, and we can put the change in a later diff.
body: @SsnL `TestTorch` is indeed being run twice in `test:cuda` and twice in `test:sparse`, although I am not sure how to address https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_cuda.py#L1882-L1884. Also it's probably easier to check Sandcastle for correct behavior after we enable the commit-level sync, and we can put the change in a later diff.
